ygData.subject: Re: Wis or Int..?
ygData.msgSnippet: Get as much Cha items as you can and wear them hile buying and selling from vendors....Enchanters make the best price shoppers due to high base Cha, Items they
ygData.messageBody:
Get as much Cha items as you can and wear them hile buying and selling from
vendors....Enchanters make the best price shoppers due to high base Cha,
Items they make if into jewlery skill ,and get a CHA Buff spell they cast on
ya...it helps alot to know how to shop ..Take to heart if you are only
worried about Skill level advancement not the failure rate, <Int >Items to
boost you up is the only thing you should be concerned about ....A stein of
muggok would help as well as it boosts intelligence as well as dex and hp<a
nifty item for casters who use 1 hand blunt or pierce >..Sincerely
Cloverleaf- Fennin Ro Server


In a message dated 11/24/99 7:18:51 AM Eastern Standard Time, xceller@...
writes:

<< wisdom determines your success rate (but also matters how high your int is
to be ABLE to succeed) and int determines your rate of skill increase.
cha helps with pricing, get a crude stein if you can

>>
